subject: Economy
question_en: What is the meaning of Labor Force Participation Rate?
question_hi: लोकतंत्र काम सम्पर्क रेट क्या है।
explanation_en: The Labor Force Participation Rate is a measure of the proportion of the working-age population engaged in employment or actively seeking employment. It is calculated as the ratio of the labor force (both employed and unemployed) to the total working-age population. The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders in a given period of time, usually a year. It represents the overall economic activity of a country.
